---
title: "import_yaml_stream_all_unique_namespaces.json"
---

## High-level description
This JSON file contains test data for importing YAML streams with unique namespaces. It consists of three JSON objects, each representing a different configuration for feature flags and segments, with two objects having explicit namespaces and one without.

## Code Structure
The file contains three separate JSON objects, each on its own line. The first two objects have a "namespace" field, while the third one does not. Each object contains "flags" and "segments" arrays with various configuration details.

## Symbols

### JSON Object 1 (namespace: "foo")
#### Description
Defines a configuration for the "foo" namespace, including two flags and one segment.

#### Internal Logic
- Defines a variant flag "flag1" with one variant and one rule
- Defines a boolean flag "flag2" with two rollout conditions
- Defines a segment "segment1" with a string comparison constraint

### JSON Object 2 (namespace: "bar")
#### Description
Defines a configuration for the "bar" namespace, including two flags and one segment.

#### Internal Logic
- Defines a variant flag "flag3" with minimal configuration
- Defines a boolean flag "flag4" with two rollout conditions
- Defines a segment "segment2" with a string comparison constraint

### JSON Object 3 (no namespace)
#### Description
Defines a configuration without a specific namespace, including two flags and one segment.

#### Internal Logic
- Contains the same flags and segment as the "bar" namespace configuration
- Lacks a "namespace" field, indicating it might be used for testing default or global configurations

## Dependencies
This file does not have any external dependencies. It is a standalone JSON data file used for testing purposes.

## Configuration
The file defines various configuration options for feature flags and segments. Key configuration elements include:

| Option | Type | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:------------|
| namespace | string | Defines the namespace for the configuration (present in first two objects) |
| flags | array | Contains flag configurations |
| segments | array | Contains segment configurations |

Flag configuration options:
| Option | Type | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:------------|
| key | string | Unique identifier for the flag |
| name | string | Display name for the flag |
| type | string | Type of the flag (e.g., "VARIANT_FLAG_TYPE", "BOOLEAN_FLAG_TYPE") |
| description | string | Description of the flag's purpose |
| enabled | boolean | Whether the flag is enabled or not |
| variants | array | For variant flags, defines the available variants |
| rules | array | For variant flags, defines the rules for variant distribution |
| rollouts | array | For boolean flags, defines the rollout conditions |

Segment configuration options:
| Option | Type | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:------------|
| key | string | Unique identifier for the segment |
| name | string | Display name for the segment |
| match_type | string | Type of matching for the segment (e.g., "ANY_MATCH_TYPE") |
| description | string | Description of the segment's purpose |
| constraints | array | Defines the constraints for the segment |

This file is likely used for testing import functionality of a feature flag management system, particularly focusing on handling multiple namespaces and various flag and segment configurations.
